name: Soul Eater - Early Access
description:
Soul Eater - Early Access Info

Soul Eater is a Top Down RPG with Cut Scenes between each Level. The Story Line is Dark Fantasy Based. 

Main Menu, Levels, and Scenes

At the Main Menu you can select any Level or Scene. When you first start playing the game Please select "Play", which will start the first Scene and then continue through the game. The Scenes happen before each Level, Read the Text then Click Next to move onto the Level or Click Main Menu to return to the Main Menu. To Contine to the Next Scene you have to find a Portal in the Level.

Race, Monsters, and Weapons

Each level you are a different Race of Monster with different Weapons.  Currently you can be 2 different Races, The Soul Eater and The Spider Skeleton. Currently their are 2  Weapons and 2 Monster Attacks, Weapons include Cleaver and Sythe while Monster Attacks include Bite and Claw.  The other Races include Skeleton, Skeleton Warrior,  Zombie,  Reaper,  and Soul Sucker. You can see your Weapon  Damage at the Bottom of your Screen. If you Click on the Monster Manual in the Bottom Left Corner it shows the Monsters Health. You can Attack Monsters by Walking into them, you take Damage and They take Damage. 

Stats and Pick-Ups

You have many Stats including Health , Souls, Deaths, Strenght, Endurance, Intelligence, and Dexterity. If your Health becomes Zero, you will not die but you will get plus one Deaths and you do respawn at the start of every Level. If your Souls reach Zero you will die, when you die click the Red X and it will take you to the Main Menu. You can Restart by selecting the Level you were on from the Main Menu. Pick-Ups include Health Potions, Armor, and Soul Gems, their are four different types of Soul Gems and four different types of Armor.  Health Potions afffect your health, Armor affects Certain stats including  Strenght, Endurance, Intelligence, and Dexterity.  Souls Gems give you Souls and affect Certain stats including  Strenght, Endurance, Intelligence, and Dexterity but, these stat affects are less then those of the Armor. 

Coming in the Future

- More Races to become

- More Enemy  Races 

- More Levels

- More Scenes

- Fixed Glitch's (If their is any - Comment any Glitch's you find Please)

- New Terrain

- And Finally New Things I Haven't Thought of Yet

             I think this covers everything about the game
